About Me

I’m an Event Organizer, Lacrosse Player, and Bitcoin Enthusiast ⚡

Events

Currently offering my services in support of Unchain 2019 Feel free to reach out to me if you’d like to participate in this year’s event!

In the past I’ve worked on:

-Lightning Hackdays

-C3 Crypto-Conference, 2018

-Reggae on the Mountain

Current Lacrosse Team

I run with Victoria Lacrosse, one of the first Lacrosse programs in Germany.

Videos from our Games will be available free on Youtube. Please we need more people to film our games, so feel free to contact me if anyone is down to help grow the game.
